column2: >
column3: >Real-Time Fertility Detection With Just 60 Seconds of Normal Breathing
column4:
>

Based on your daily hormonal measurements, physiological changes, symptoms, and lifestyle, ILO’s AI system identifies exactly where you are in your ovulation cycle.
column7: >Know The Right Time For Conception.  (Seriously)
column10:
>

Your body releases different levels of CO2 during different stages of your fertility cycle. 

Based on the levels of CO2 you release while breathing for 60 seconds, ILO knows exactly where you are in your cycle and if you're ovulating.
column18: >Getting Pregnant Can Be Hard. ILO Makes It Easier
column19:
>

Unlike other products, ILO provides personal guidance that's NOT based on a single, fixed regimen, but on where you're at right now.

ILO helps you understand ‘the why’ and ‘the where’ behind your fertility cycle and ovulation, linking your symptoms, your fertility window and your overall cycle.
column22:
> 

Every woman is different, which means that there's no ""standard"" cycle. There's even variation from cycle to cycle due to stress and other common factors.

ILO uses advanced AI technology to adapt to your personal data to give you more accurate results every cycle.

That's right: incredibly accurate data entirely based on what your body is saying. Even if your cycles are irregular.
column23: >Backed By Science, Proven By Births
column32: >Our Method Really Is The Most Accurate
column33:
>

Hormone test stripes are only accurate at one time during the day: they can show a wrong result when performing the test outside of the morning window.

Temperature and pulse measurements are incredibly affected by illness and stress.

Heavily relying on past cycles to predict your fertility with temperature or mucus is just as inaccurate, as more than 60% of women have at least 6 days of variation cycle to cycle.

ILO is accurate, and ILO is honest about its accuracy.

Our competitors are only being partially honest with you. The numbers and data from their published clinical trials do not match the data they’re using in their marketing. They’re pulling only their best data, their best results. 

For example, top a brand you’ve heard of (and probably tried) claims they can predict 5-10 high fertile days before peak fertility for one third of all women. This sounds great! However, showing more than 6 days of a fertile window is too wide a window when trying to conceive, and this data doesn’t really tell you anything, as 10 days is 1/3 of a month. Additionally, to produce these numbers, this brand is only giving you data from 89 women, despite the thousands of women they claim to have run trials with.

A different top brand you’ve heard of (and also probably tried) claims they have experience with thousands of cycles and that they ran a clinical trial for over one year. However, they only use 247 of those cycles and their data in advertising and communication. 

Another top brand tells you they offer a predication of 8 fertile days. However, scientifically, this does not make sense: the maximum sperm life is 5 days and the actual fertile day around Ovulation is 12-24 hours.  

We’re not here to trick you into purchasing ILO. We’re here because we saw a way to improve the way the world is trying to conceive. We’re trying to make a difference. Our studies will be published soon. Please reach out to our team if you have questions, or you can see the science linked at the bottom of this page.
column37:
>

With ILO, you can choose to document your symptoms (such as breast pain and headaches) so you can track and prepare for your cycle symptoms month over month.
column42:
>

Studies show you’re almost 40% more likely to get pregnant when intercourse is timed to match your fertility window after tracking your cycle.
ILO knows your window.
column45: >Reliable Guidance At Every Step
column46:
>

Whether you’re trying now or you’ve already conceived, the ILO app contains a massive library on reproductive health and wellness from conception to birth.
column49: >Make Family Planning Stress Free
column50:
>

We put extra effort into ensuring there was nothing complicated about ILO's app experience. Are you ovulating? Find out with a glance. ILO will be available for iOS and Android.
column62: >We Are Carbomed, We’re The Team Bringing You ILO
column71: >Helping You Conceive Starting In February 2019
column80:
>

We are able to ship worldwide. VAT and GST not included. Please see reward details for the shipping cost that applies to you.

We plan to ship the product in February 2019. We will keep you up to date on our progress and the expected delivery date of your order. Actual ship dates may vary. We will keep you notified of your product ship date

ILO will never be offered at these discounts again. By backing now you'll also be one over the very first to get and use ILO. By ordering now, you'll receive your product well before the rest of the world, which means you'll get a jump start on your path to conception.
column81: >More About The Science Behind ILO
column82:
>

If you'd like to learn more about the extensive research completed to support ILO's science, please see one of the studies below that show that the CO2 partial pressure is linked to the female cycle:

• Phasic menstrual cycle effects on the control of breathing in healthy women: click here.

column1: <h3 style=""text-align: center
<h3 style=""text-align: center
<h3 style=""text-align: center

Huma-i is a developed product that has sold off shelves in Korea in the 6 months it has been available to consumers. Much thought has been given to the concern of air quality on the population, especially infants and children, the most vulnerable of us. Huma-i lets mothers see the invisible murder, air pollution, by measuring air quality anytime and anywhere.

This version of Huma-i here on Indiegogo is the beginning of our international model that includes additional sensor readings aside from fine and ultra fine dust measurements. So place your order knowing that it will be fulfilled in time!
","Most Reliable . Portable . Personal
Air Quality Monitor, Huma-i Black (Hi-150)
Invisible Critical Moleculars
The invisible killer who's coming to you quitely.

As climate change and increased industrial growth threatens the quality of the air, the clean air we take for granted is changing day by day.  The air we breathe is a complicated mixture that oftentimes contains harmful particulate matter so small, it goes undetected by most sensors.
A Story About Huma-i
The air you're breathing is safe?

Huma-i has thought about the major concerns of the mothers over and over, especially moms with small children, whose immune system is a little bit weak. One of their concerns is, definitely, to bring up their kids with safety and health.

However, the number of annual death by air pollution, unfortunately, is increasing every year. According to WHO(World Health Organization), the number of death by indoor air pollution exceeds the number by outdoor air pollution.
For my family
Healthy life from small interests.
Now staying indoor is not safe anymore. Here’s solution by Huma-i.

Huma-i let the moms to see the invisible murderer, air pollution, by measuring air quality anytime and anywhere immediately. Huma-i will help mom & baby, at least from the polluted air, to live in a safe and healthy condition.
So, we recommend that you take a small interest in finding healthy solutions from small, invisible hazards for your family and loved ones.
Anytime . Anywhere . Anyone
In real time, anyone can check the air quality comfortably anywhere.
Huma-i empowers you to know about the air you are breathing no matter where you are.

Its patented, state of the art air quality sensors are housed in a highly portable, well finished device with a monitor so intuitive, any child can understand the readings.  Don’t let your loved ones go unaware of the air whether it is at home, outdoors, or overseas.
# When you go out with your child
# When you were with your family
# When you ride a bike
# When you go jogging
# Indoor Space
More About Huma-i
Small but superior features

​Huma-i offers high quality sensors developed in-house and produced in Korea, ensuring the most accurate air quality readings and a long service lifetime.  The product is the most portable, serious air quality monitor on the market which is no wonder why it is the market leader in South Korea.  This tested and highly demanded product is now upgraded with air quality measurements in addition to fine & ultra fine dust (CO2, VOC, Temperature, Humidity) for the US & international markets to ensure that all people across the globe can breathe with peace of mind, for themselves and their loved ones.
Accurate measurement and convenient portability
Carbon Dioxide and VOC measurement
Particulate Matter measurement (PM2.5 & PM10)
Temperature and Humidity measurement
Pocket-size
Details
① Power and mode selection button
Power Button

If you press the button for 1 second, it will be in power-on state. It automatically switches to power-off state when not in use for 10 minutes to protect battery life. The status LED will blink 1 minute before automatic power-off. At this time, if you press the button lightly, it will be switched on again for 10 minutes, and the mode will not change.
Mode Selection Button
Each time you press the mode select button, the display mode changes cyclically in the following order.
Integrated Display Mode (PM2.5 / VOC / CO2) => WHO Mode => PM Mode (PM2.5 / PM10) => VOC Mode => CO2 Mode => Temperature/Humidity Mode
② Status Light
The status LED lets you know the status of CO2, VOC and fine dust/ultra-fine dust.
③ Display mode
Integrated display mode
It is shown in a step-by-step graph so that air quality can be judged easier than difficult figures.
PM2.5, VOC and CO2 can be viewed in one screen. Graph with 4 steps shows the air quality - good, moderate, poor and unhealthy
WHO mode (Icon mode)
You can easily recognize the good and poor state of find dust by 4 kinds of icons.In this mode, it automatically displays the worst between PM2.5 and PM10.
PM (Particulate Matter) display mode : Simultaneously displays PM2.5 and PM10 measurement values.
VOC (Volatile Organic Compound) display mode : VOC concentration is displayed together with the ppm unit figures.
CO2 display mode : CO2 concentration is displayed together with the ppm unit figures.
(* In case of CO2 and VOC, the value is displayed after 15 ~ 60 seconds at power-on, after which the value is updated in every second)
Temperature/Humidity mode : It shows temperature and humidity in one screen.
(* In case of temperature and humidity, the temperature/humidity sensor is inside of the product and may cause a deviation of 5 ~ 10%)
④ Battery Status Display
This icon displays remaining battery status.
Demo Video : How to use this

Huma-i lets mothers see the invisible murder, air pollution, by measuring air quality anytime and anywhere.

This project is to help me raise money to cover the cost of a business license for a non profit group for sexual assualt survivors who report rape to local authorities. This group collects clean, new underwear for rape victims at local hospitals and police stations. Undergarments are generally collected as part of a rape kit. They may have to leave feeling exposed and even more vulnerable after reporting the attack. Lets all get together to do a little bit to help promote a feeling that is both comfortable and safe. Multiple, clean undergarments are needed

For many years, Roshi Joan Halifax, abbot of Upaya Zen Center in Santa Fe, New Mexico, has hosted a medical mission, called Nomads Clinic into the Nepali Himalayas to care for people who have little medical care available. Far beyond the electrical grid, most of the villagers have respiratory problems from a lifetime of cooking, heating, and lighting by burning wood and other fuels indoors.

In 2013, Dr. Charles McDonald, a pulmonary specialist who was on the medical team that year, took 200 Little Sun solar lights with him to give away. The response was amazing.

In the aftermath of the two large, and many small earthquakes in Nepal , we would like to redouble his efforts, and send 400  Little Suns to Nepal with the Nomads Clinic this year.

These high quality durable solar-powered LED lamps have been used by women to sew and weave by, pilgrims and porters to travel by, people to read and study by, and everyone to work and cook by. They've been used for throat, eye, and ear inspections, for dentistry, or preparing tuberculosis slides, for changing dressings and looking closely at infections inside dim rooms.

The electrical grid and infrastructure in Nepal, which has never been available away from the cities, has been greatly compromised. Many, many people are living under tarps and makeshift housing at this time, and will be living this way for a long time, no matter the weather. These small portable solar rechargeable lights will bring much needed light to people who are suffering greatly. 
We ask that you help us to bring light to Nepal, and with deep gratitude we thank you for helping us in this effort.

If we raise more money than is needed for the 400 Little Suns, the extra donations will go directly into Upaya Zen Center's  Earthquake Relief Fund, https://www.upaya.org/give/fund.php?id=22


Little Sun solar lights:
Little Sun is a small hand-held solar LED light developed by artist Olafur Eliasson and engineer Frederik Ottesen. Its plastic casing looks like a sunflower, and it has a long lanyard that may be worn around the neck or hung as a lamp while in use. The energy gathered with its small solar panel is stored by three rechargeable AAA batteries, which will work at full power, under constant use for 2 years or more, before they need replacing. 

With deep gratitude, Miranda Gray, campaign coordinator, wants to thank the following people for making this campaign possible:
Roshi Joan Halifax, abbot of Upaya Zen Center
Joshin Byrnes, vice abbot of Upaya Zen Center
Larry Veltman - videographer
Cira Crowell - still photographer
Rebecca Solnit - writer and text support
Dr. Charles McDonald, Jane Steinberg, Rachel Greenstein - campaign support
Noah Rossetter, Laura Hockenbury, Sam Watts, Peggie Bates - video interviewees
Video music by Bharat Nepali Party

Sam's much loved mountain bike was stolen from our house in Bangor, it was then thrown from Menai Bridge in an act of wasteful vandalism. Sam worked hard to buy the bike and has planned to spend the summer riding and racing around Europe, however cannot now afford to buy a new bike. If all of his friends and anyone that wants to help could put in as little as £1 it would mean he may be able to save his planned summer! The support we received when trying to find the bike was incredible and it would be wonderful to see Sam riding a bike again! Anything you can afford to give will help, thanks in advance!


Update: Thanks for all the support from everyone that has contributed! It is amazing to see how generous people are! I know that sam truly appreciates every penny and the rate at which people have been donating has rekindled hope for his summer! I set the goal at £500 underestimating your kindness and it looks as if we are to push past it, obviously everything donated over this goal will go straight into Sam's new bike so please keep donating!

column2: >This is Buddha Bus Yoga
column3: >Buddha Bus Yoga™ takes Yoga out of the studio by providing all-inclusive classes at various locations. Our business provides on-site classes aimed towards recreational relaxation for all levels
column4: our clients will include workplaces, colleges, athletic facilities, food markets, and more. The “Buddha Bus” itself is a fully equipped business vehicle that carries enough supplies to comfortably host classes up to 30 people in any location. When Buddha Bus Yoga™ arrives to your location to teach class it comes with enough mats and blocks for everyone. In addition, every class will be taught with a speaker system that adds a nice musical groove to the class atmosphere. Individuals taking the Yoga class will never be paying for the class because the class is paid for by whomever is in charge of the space that the Buddha Bus is traveling to.
column6: >About our name, “Buddha Bus Yoga”
column7: >Hi, my name is Sara Maloney and I am the founder of Buddha Bus Yoga. I have been a practicing certified Yoga instructor for 2 years running my own classes as well as working at various studios in New England. Buddha’s teachings inspire me daily in my meditation practices at home and at the Cambridge Zen Center. To me, Yoga is the synchronization of mind and body. The goal here is to have body and mind work together in balance, together strengthening each other. One way that the mind can refocus and come to the body is through mindfulness and present focus. A person thinking about their next pose, or their shopping list will have difficulty feeling the full benefits of their yoga practice. To avoid this distraction I often look to Buddha’s words and wisdom on mindfulness, living in the moment, and coming back to the breath. Though Buddha did not lead in the Yogic movement, he did provide great wisdom on concepts that are imperative to a complete yoga Practice like mindfulness, gratitude, and living in the moment.
column8: >Buddha once spoke, “Your work is to discover your world, and then, with all of your heart, give yourself to it.” Practicing Yoga and spreading its emotional and physical benefits with others is what I truly believe my “world” is. Buddha Bus Yoga™ spreads Yoga to people in unconventional places to enhance Yoga’s accessibility to all
column9: I chose to name my mission after the man who inspired me to discover my world.
column10: >Where will Buddha Bus Yoga make Yoga accessible?
column11: >Buddha Bus Yoga’s main target is currently 9-5 workplaces, college campuses, athletic facilities, community events and schools. Buddha Bus Yoga has two main goals: build a fun, widespread community and alleviate the pain that Americans face daily like stress, disconnect, and a restless mind and body. By taking Buddha Bus Yoga™ into workplaces the employees of any office can take 30-60 minutes out of their day to step away from work, their mental to-do lists, and life’s daily demands, and reground. Anyone who becomes a part of the Buddha Bus Yoga™ community will be able to come to a mat (provided to them) and partake in a Yoga practice (free to them) and step away from the craziness of everyday life for a moment. This will not only improve the health of the individual, but also the community they are a part of.
column17: >Suffolk Voice Article by Nicole Baker
column19: >See every step along this journey!
column20: >Vlogs, Yoga photos, and life as BBY founder: https://www.instagram.com/yogi_smaloney/
column21: >Why we need your support!
column22: >Buddha Bus Yoga™ has a very simple business plan, but much more goes into it than meets the eye! One of the most exciting elements of Buddha Bus Yoga™ is the all-inclusivity it brings to every class. Every time the Buddha Bus stops it will roll out the mats, blocks, and speakers necessary to hold the perfect class. All of this plus the instructor of course! The idea is to continually provide a hands-free, stress-free, Yoga experience to all. Right now Buddha Bus Yoga needs the capital to buy mats, blocks, and a speaker system. As well as mat cleaner, company insurance, a leer camper shell, the Limited Liability Company registration fee, and the Graphic design work already utilized.
column26: >Is Yoga growing in the market place?
column27: >Oh yes, it is. Buddha Bus Yoga’s initial target market place is New England, but especially Boston, Massachusetts. This year Boston was selected as “The Most Active City in the US” by Blue Zones LLC, a community transformation program which monitors large metropolitan areas across the country and reports data on fitness, healthcare, wellness and accessibility. According to Blue Zones, a health conscious community provides easy access to healthy foods, gyms, fitness studios and other wellness programs. Boston fitness and extra curricular activities were measured in 2015 using a numerical ranking system, and out of the top ten Yoga ranked seventh.
column28: >Out of the total population, 37% of Boston is between the ages of 20-34, which is the demographic reported to be the most active age group in the United States. Of this group, 73% takes advantage of exercise programs offered in the community. This equates to more than 239,000 residents. With Boston leading nationally in health and activity, the future looks promising.
column30: >I am “not good at Yoga” will I embarrass myself?
column31: >This question should be listed under VVFAQ , “very very frequently asked questions”, but there is no such thing as being ""not good at yoga""! In my opinion, a person who has only just stepped on a Yoga mat is good at yoga. Why? Because they have chosen to be there. Being open to try, to challenge your comfort zone, and to be present are all elements that build the foundation of the Yoga practice. If you have stepped on a mat, you are already half way there!
column32: >I see the physical components of Yoga breaking down into three distinct categories: balance, flexibility, and strength. Everybody is stronger in one of these categories than the other, and by harnessing the category you are stronger in you can grow in the other two, when this happens your whole yoga practice grows. So the answer is no! You can't possibly embarrass yourself. You simply need to come to the mat with an open mind.
column34: >I’ve never done Yoga before.
column35: >Can beginners take class with Buddha Bus Yoga™?
column36: >Yes! The way all Buddha Bus Yoga classes are taught is from the most basic level with variations that allow for the more experienced practitioners to pursue challenge if they so choose. Buddha Bus Yoga classes teach from the foundational poses because our practice is not focused on calorie burning, twisting yourself into a pretzel, or standing on your head. Our classes are about taking the individual out of there busy bustling schedules and relax a bit by connecting with their bodies and minds, and of course, have a little fun while doing it.
column37: >If you still aren’t convinced, let the numbers speak for themselves! Reports released from Yoga Alliance this year found that 34% of the United States population is likely to try Yoga for the first time this year. This is great news for Buddha Bus Yoga because our main clientele is beginners, and beginner’s make-up 98% of current practitioners in the country. Overall, there has been a 20% increase in people practicing Yoga in Boston for the past 4 years. If you are anew to Yoga, you are in the majority!
column39: >What kind of bus is it?
column40: >The ""bus"" is not actually a bus in this stage of Buddha Bus Yoga, the beginning of Buddha Bus Yoga will be bootstrapped in every element so that we can get off the ground and get Yoga into the places where it really matters! In order for this to happen we will be using an already owned F1 50 truck and put a Leer camper shell on the back to convert it into a storage company vehicle! After building up some profit Buddha Bus Yoga plans to invest in a more brand-oriented vehicle, something similar to a bus  but with a bit more groove. With funky colors and a great exterior, the Buddha Bus will become a well-known vehicle in the New England area, note, this is in fact a long-term goal and will not be a part of the items purchased after being funded. For now, the main focus is not so much the aesthetic of our brand as much as getting out and getting individuals on their mats!
column41: >So if there is no actual “bus” why Buddha Bus Yoga?
column42: >The “bus” is a concept. Bare with me here, the idea of a ""bus"" represents community and mobility, which are two main pillars of what Buddha Bus Yoga is. It is important to note that the long-term goal is indeed to buy a bus like vehicle, but for now, a decked out F150 will do!
column44: >If I am taking class how much do I pay?
column45: >Nothing! The root of Buddha Bus Yoga is to make it accessible to anyone! When an individual is taking a class they are not paying, instead, BBY’s class transactions go on with the people who are in charge of the organizations that are being visited. For example, when visiting a company the employees will not pay for a class, but human resources who are given a budget for events in the workplace will be. The same goes for any school or outdoor community event where Buddha Bus Yoga visits.
column47: >How do you see this venture scaling?
column48: >Bringing Yoga to places that will enhance the health of both the individual and the community they are a part of is something that BBY hopes to do beyond Boston and New England spaces. In order for this to happen with great efficacy, there needs to be more than one bus, there needs to be a fleet! With quality control as a priority, we see Buddha Bus Yoga franchising. This sounds commercial at first, but think of the immense spread of good. Like your favorite food truck that you see every day at lunch! This is an aspiration but not a current focus, hopefully someday we create an army of goodness!
column50: >RamCam Productions (video production and editing)
column51: >Sam Castle (video production and editing)
column54: >Nicole Baker and Brenna Gomes
column55: >Jenni Dinger and Chaim Letwin (mentors)
column57: >Danijela Banic and My Linh Le (Graphic Design)

0,"<div class=""routerContentStory-storyBody"" data-v-1df7bf5a=""""><h3>What if we could make better decisions with the help of a super-computer assistant?
Our decisions are important—they direct the paths of our lives and projects.

Technology and computers have advanced to the level that the little mobile devices we carry around have super-computing powers. 

Yet how has this helped us in the PROCESS of making better decisions?
Mostly, it hasn't. We still make lists of good and bad points, maybe we rank them from most important to least, then we decide using a combination of gut feelings and logic. About the only help we get from our computers is to gather information through the internet—which is helpful, but we use the information with the same old pre-technology process.
Desdi intends to change this. She's puts Monte Carlo simulation—the most advanced decision-making technology ever invented—at your fingertips in an easy-to-use app on your mobile phone or tablet.
Monte Carlo was invented by the mathematician Stanislaw Ulam while playing the card game Solitaire. He wondered what the chances of getting a successful hand were.
All the possible combinations proved too complicated, so he wondered...
He took this idea of how to solve complex problems in a simple way to his mathematician and computer scientist friend Jon Von Neumann.
So, solving complex problems became much easier with the help of computers. Back then, it took room sized computers to perform these simulations.

But today, our mobile devices have all the super-computing power needed to help us solve our decision problems.

Desdi will help you break your decision down into manageable pieces, assign values to these pieces, and then simulate the likely outcome—so you can make better decisions.
About me and my company

I'm Richard DeVost and I started a company called Vinntech, Inc. to make people's and organizations' work better (vinn comes from an Icelandic word about work). Desdi is our first app to make work and life better.

It's taken over a year of full-time work to develop her. Getting to this point has been tougher than I expected. Mikkel Svane writes about the challenges of starting a company in StartupLand: How three guys risked everything to turn an idea into a global business. Reading about the stress and challenges he and his friends faced developing their product and starting their company keeps me encouraged.
<h3>What we want

Companies succeed or fail, lives flourish or languish, careers thrive or sputter, relationships and trust are strengthened or broken, ... by our decisions. We want to provide an advanced, easy-to-use, decision-making tool for teams and individuals--from business teams evaluating a multi-million dollar investment to individuals choosing a career.
<h3>Our risks &amp

We are shooting for a November release of Desdi. First to the Apple market for iPhones and iPads, then to the Android market. Desdi is based on a solid theoretical decision-making framework and is built using a modern test-driven development methodology.
My greatest fear is that Desdi :
<ol>
• won't run on some iOS devices, or
• has crippling bugs we didn't discover in our internal testing.
Please help us test Desdi on your iPhone or iPad so she will accomplish her goal of making decisions better.

Apple allows us to sign up to 1,000 beta testers. We will send an in invitation from Apple to install their TestFlight app that lets you install Desdi (for free). We will give a license of Desdi Pro ($29.99 value) to the first 100 people who install Desdi and provide feedback of their experience. You can launch right in and start using Desdi for a decision you are considering, or watch the video above to get an overview of how to use Desdi and Monte Carlo simulation.
Funds raised will go to purchasing additional hardware—we always need more hardware :)
","What if we could make better decisions with the help of a super-computer assistant?
Our decisions are important—they direct the paths of our lives and projects.

Technology and computers have advanced to the level that the little mobile devices we carry around have super-computing powers. Yet how has this helped us in the PROCESS of making better decisions? Mostly, it hasn't. We still make lists of good and bad points, maybe we rank them from most important to least, then we decide using a combination of gut feelings and logic. About the only help we get from our computers is to gather information through the internet—which is helpful, but we use the information with the same old pre-technology process.
Desdi intends to change this. She's puts Monte Carlo simulation—the most advanced decision-making technology ever invented—at your fingertips in an easy-to-use app on your mobile phone or tablet.
Monte Carlo was invented by the mathematician Stanislaw Ulam while playing the card game Solitaire. He wondered what the chances of getting a successful hand were.
All the possible combinations proved too complicated, so he wondered...
He took this idea of how to solve complex problems in a simple way to his mathematician and computer scientist friend Jon Von Neumann.
So, solving complex problems became much easier with the help of computers. Back then, it took room sized computers to perform these simulations.

But today, our mobile devices have all the super-computing power needed to help us solve our decision problems.Desdi will help you break your decision down into manageable pieces, assign values to these pieces, and then simulate the likely outcome—so you can make better decisions.
About me and my company

I'm Richard DeVost and I started a company called Vinntech, Inc. to make people's and organizations' work better (vinn comes from an Icelandic word about work). Desdi is our first app to make work and life better.

It's taken over a year of full-time work to develop her. Getting to this point has been tougher than I expected. Mikkel Svane writes about the challenges of starting a company in StartupLand: How three guys risked everything to turn an idea into a global business. Reading about the stress and challenges he and his friends faced developing their product and starting their company keeps me encouraged.
What we want

Companies succeed or fail, lives flourish or languish, careers thrive or sputter, relationships and trust are strengthened or broken, ... by our decisions. We want to provide an advanced, easy-to-use, decision-making tool for teams and individuals--from business teams evaluating a multi-million dollar investment to individuals choosing a career.
Our risks & challenges

We are shooting for a November release of Desdi. First to the Apple market for iPhones and iPads, then to the Android market. Desdi is based on a solid theoretical decision-making framework and is built using a modern test-driven development methodology.
My greatest fear is that Desdi :
won't run on some iOS devices, or
has crippling bugs we didn't discover in our internal testing.
Please help us test Desdi on your iPhone or iPad so she will accomplish her goal of making decisions better.

Apple allows us to sign up to 1,000 beta testers. We will send an in invitation from Apple to install their TestFlight app that lets you install Desdi (for free). We will give a license of Desdi Pro ($29.99 value) to the first 100 people who install Desdi and provide feedback of their experience. You can launch right in and start using Desdi for a decision you are considering, or watch the video above to get an overview of how to use Desdi and Monte Carlo simulation.
Funds raised will go to purchasing additional hardware—we always need more hardware :)",10.0,0,"1 Campaign

","Big Fannie Annie has been in show business her whole life – movies, TV shows, commercials, music videos, live stage shows, plays, stand up comedy, and burlesque exotic dancer.

column1: Big Fannie Annie is in immediate need of gastric bypass surgery. Her doctors are requesting $10,000 as a down payment to perform the surgery. The surgery will cost in excess of $16,000.
She does not have health insurance, is not yet a Senior Citizen and struggles financially.

Big Fannie Annie has been diabetic for many years. As she ages, her body has become unable to process insulin injections. Her vital organs are failing. She recently had eye surgery to save her eyesight. Her doctors state the gastric-bypass surgery is her only option to assist with the severe progression of her diabetes. Without it, she will die.
You can learn more about Fannie Annie on her website (contains partial nude images, NSFW): http://www.bigfannieannie.com
Your Contribution Can:
SAVE HER LIFE!Her doctor wants to perform this surgery as soon as possible, but we need some money first.
Be eligible for the perks listed in this campaign. You can also purchase some items directly from Fannie Annie via her website. Http://www.bigfannieannie.com .
Please donate what you can, or just help spread the word. Thank you so much.
We love Fannie Annie so much:

Big Fannie Annie paved the way for many a BBW comedian and performer. Her hilarious jokes, appearances and performances proved world-wide that a body that big, could also be a HUGE talent. Losing her because of something so cruel like needing surgery, would create an even bigger hole in our hearts and arts community.
The joy and wonder that she brings, whether through her art of performances or her beautiful costumes, is not a talent that should suffer and die painfully.
Other ways you can help. We know there are a lot of causes and needs in the world today. We understand when $10.00 is just too much to donate.
Please pass along the link to this fundraiser,
“LIKE” our page on FaceBook:  http://www.facebook.com/GetWellFannieAnnie
Every effort helps save Fannie Annie's life!!
Thank you so much for all of your love and support to keep this legend alive and on the road to recovery.",0.0,0,"3 Campaigns

The Clubz Fitness Program is a phenomenal new way of turning
your body into a
fat-torching, muscle sculpting machine. The
secret is efficiency
column2: finding a functional fitness program that works your body

column1: hard, but does it in just minutes a day.

The Clubz Program delivers that efficiency with what we call Torsional Training.

By adding our patent pending Clubz weights as an extension of the body, you
automatically kick it into high gear and work harder.  You don’t have to think about it…it just happens!
So what does this mean for
you?<span>  It means you’re using much
more energy and burning more calories.
You’re increasing your heart rate. You’re strengthening your core.  And you’re developing lean muscle.
The end result: Faster,
Better Results!
A
little bit about the tool. The Clubz have been around for a long time. In
fact, they were used in the 1800’s and early 1900’s by elite athletes and
soldiers.  Some would even argue that the Clubz were the first organized group
fitness program ever! And believe it or not, Club Swinging was a gold medal
event in the 1904 and 1932 Summer Olympic Games.
What
we’ve done is improved the tool and made it current by combining it with a

mainstream high intensity interval training program. Now you’ve probably heard this term before but might not know exactly what it means. All you really need to know is it’s short bursts of everything you’ve got exercise followed by a brief rest.

A tip...don’t let the size of the Clubz weight fool you.  With the Clubz program a little bit of weight goes a LONG way!


The Clubz program is based on Functional Training.  So what does that mean?

It means we are asking you to make whole body movements where you are using a bunch of muscle groups at the same time.  This is muscle integration instead of muscle isolation…think jumping jacks versus a dumbbell curl. The body is being trained as a whole instead of in parts. And then by adding the Clubz weights as an extension of your body, we’ve added some hot sauce to those movements.

Remember that’s Torsional Training. What it delivers is EVERYTHING you need in a fitness program in a short amount of time.

Look life gets in the way! We know you are busy people and finding time for a fitness program can be tough.We don’t want you to change your life to fit the Clubz program…we’ve designed the Clubz program to fit your life!


The Clubz program is made up of three types of 30-Minute workouts: Cardio, Power &
column2:
Active Recovery!  Cardio is designed to really get that blood pumping! Power is designed to add some more gas to that fire! Active Recovery is designed to bring it down a notch but still actively move your body!

This is an eight-week program…eight weeks of awesome effort!  If you put in the work, you won’t believe how you’ll feel on the other side.

column1: The Clubz Calendar has been laid out in a way that is super easy to follow.  It is made up of four Phases:
Phase 1 is the 1st 2 weeks…we call it Fast Start.
Phase 2 is the 2nd 2 weeks…how about some Hot Sauce!
Phase 3 is the 3rd 2 weeks… get ready for the Inferno.
Phase 4 is the final 2 weeks…we call it Addiction for a reason!

Each Phase has a unique Cardio and Power DVD, and then you supplement with Active Recovery.



When it came to designing nutrition as part of the Clubz program, we kept to the same theme.  We don’t want you to change your life to fit a nutrition plan
column2:
we want you to have a nutrition plan to fit your life!



If you’re looking for a rigid program with a strict menu, you won’t find it here. What you will find here is a new frame of reference. A new outlook.  A new way of thinking about the way you fuel your body.

We named it Clean Eatz for a reason. When people hear about ‘clean eating’ what does that even mean?  Most people probably don’t know where to begin or are overloaded with too much or bad information.
 
Our style…keep it simple! Clean Eatz is a tool kit.  In fact we give you 10 specific tools.  We break it down into easy to understand concepts that become habits.  And once you form a habit, it’s easy to turn it into permanent behavior.

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Comments, Questions, Partnerships

For questions, additional information or media inquiries please shoot us an email at info@fitclubz.com.  Thank you for your support!

Our Story
Mona Navarro (AF3IRM Irvine Coordinator) &
column2: Jollene Levid (AF3IRM National Chairperson) have never been the healthiest kids on the block. This January, however, they're running a 1/2 marathon and decided to fundraise for the organization they dedicate hours of work to each week: AF3IRM (www.af3irm.org), a transnational feminist women's organization with over 22 years of history in changing women's lives.

column1: Help Mona stay focused on her training and Jollene finally give up cigarettes in their attempt to get healthy and fund an important organization!
The Impact

AF3IRM (formerly known as GABNet) is a women's organization that works against the trafficking of women and children, against militarization, and for im/migrant women's rights. It is an all-volunteer organization funded solely by community donors. AF3IRM receives no grants, only money fundraised through grassroots efforts!
<h3>What We Need &amp
$500 or more: help fund a national conference of women in 2013! fund low-income women, high school students to attend
$300-$500: fund an airline ticket for an AF3IRM organizer to fly to different US cities to build new chapters!
$200-300: fund our speakers bureau trips
column2: help us create and circulate our national newsletter!

column1: $100: help us pay for our website
column2: buy a megaphone for each chapter!

column1: $50: provide flyers and photocopies for our next event or action!
$1-$50: fund postage and office supplies for AF3IRM!

My name is Walter Olkewicz and I've had the good fortune to be
an actor for the past 40 years. I've done some 50 movies and over a 100 TV
shows. That ended about 15 years ago with my first knee surgery. Infections
cropped up over and over again to the tune of, to date, 19 surgeries and my
living in a wheel chair the past ten years. Recently I was introduced to a doctor
from Mexico who'd had great results with the treatment of infections. The shots
I was given have been working and according to my surgeon the infections have been subsiding. The prayers of friends and family were finally answered.

The only problem is the injections and the care I've needed to continue- none of this is covered by insurance. I've depleted all of my savings and I simply can not afford to continue without help. Before this treatment started my doctor spoke of the very real possibility of having my leg amputated. Needless to say, this scared the bejesus out of me. After so many surgeries and this most welcome recent success, I simply can not even imagine not continuing.
Please Help!

**** I'd like at this point to thank all who have helped. As most of you know this is the 2nd half of a campaign that started a couple of months ago. Although I only reached a bit less than 40% of my goal (explaining the need for this campaign), I have begun the treatments and have increased their frequency 200%!! The results are miraculous! Talk of amputation is at this point off the table. Though still a possibility it has gone from a 50/50 chance to less than a 5% chance. I can breathe easier. But now I need to complete the program which will reach into about a 6 month total. The shots both eradicate the infection AND (the more important part right now) build the cells and revive a leg that hasn't been used much in the past 12-15 years. Two months ago it was like trying to walk on a wet noodle. As my leg builds strength (currently at bread stick status), it will eventually- with a shipload of hard work- return to most of the strength I had in the leg 20 years ago.  Part of my ""Goal"" calculations include work with a physical trainer. Luckily some of that IS covered by insurance. Insurance covers 8 times per 3-month period, I need work with a trainer 5+ times a week.Not an easy path, but one I can dedicate myself to. Thanks to all of you.

Over the first 30 years of my blessed career I was known for helping people (In the ten years that I ran my theater- The Jewel Box- over half of my students were there on ""Scholarships"" because they simply could not afford to come to class otherwise). I have coached fellow actors, people on the set, pretty much anybody I was lucky enough to work with for free, just trying to give back some of the good fortune I'd been lucky enough to receive.
Now I find it time to ask for help.
The estimated cost of these injections, the travel involved with obtaining them, and the personal care I need in the time until I am walking and ""on my feet""
again is about fifty thousand dollars (that figure might seem high until you consider that the hospital and doctor bills that were covered by insurance is nearly half a million)
True ""Hope"" is finally in my heart again. And being the creative animal
that I am thoughts for a new theater keep me awake at night. I will make it
happen! You can't imagine how frustrating something like persistent knee
infections can be in blocking this dream. It would be like Picasso not being
able to paint because he is in court fighting overdue traffic tickets. Okay,
it's not exactly the same but you get the idea.
Over the past few years I have had lots of hospital time to read and study the
great spiritual thinkers. I've come to understand that my ideas for an uplifting,
inspiring theater are a direct result of me connecting with my Divine Purpose. I don't want that to sound egotistical or ""highfalutin"", you see each of us
has a Divine Purpose. I've just been lucky enough to finally understand mine.
So anyone generous enough to contribute, I will gladly include you in our opening audience at ""Up On Stage"", my new theater.
Sooo....

Anybody who contributes $25  gets an autographed picture of me from whatever work of mine they most like (or a copy of my knee X-rays if you are goofy enough for that to be more appealing to you). I apologize for the levity, but I learned a while ago that if I can't laugh at all this I am in real trouble.
For $50 dollars you will get four tickets to my first weeks opening - copies of my knee X-rays will be distributed at the door.

And for a $100 dollars or more you will get an autograph picture, four tickets to opening week, and my son will come over and mow your lawn.  Okay he is probably too busy to do that. If you call me I'll give you my advice on how to make your lawn greener by using paper machete mulch.
Thank you very much for even reading this request. Please understand that
despite any frivolity this is a most serious situation. My life and future career
depend on it.
Financial times being what they are, if you can't contribute yourself, I hope you will be willing to spread the word of my situation to your personal contacts. I
believe we are all here on this planet to help each other. I hope you agree. And I hope you will consider my plight worthy of your generosity. If not my prayers
are with you for wherever your generosity might flow.

Financial times being what they are, if you can't contribute yourself, I hope you will be willing to spread the word of my situation to your personal contacts. I
believe we are all here on this planet to help each other. I hope you agree. And I hope you will consider my plight worthy of your generosity. If not my prayers
are with you for wherever your generosity might flow.",0.0,0,"5 Campaigns

So Far.......

I've been going at this hard since August. Dieting and working out /cardio twice a day EVERYDAY before and after 8-10 hr work days.  I have reached a spiritual place in this journey now. There have been times when I could not continue, physically.  At those moments, I asked a god of my understanding for help the rest of the way through.  I have experienced that assistance and that's when I realized I am not alone in this!  I talk to my higherpower  (and my mom, may she rest in peace 04/12/14) every night as I am falling asleep. I express how grateful I am to have the ability to attempt such a physically taxing challenge along with all of lifes demands.  I remain humble by asking the universe for financial assistance so I can complete this mission and give hope to those who think they cannot accomplish something of this magnitude because they have a chronic disease, limited by age, and/or have mental health issues, like drug/alcohol addiction.  I end every prayer with.....

Thank You
Thank You
Thank You, God!!

0,"

My grandparents are so special. The give and give of themselves and expect nothing in return. My grandpa is a disabled Vietnam veteran and a retired firefighter. My grandma is a housewife who is now living with COPD, congestive heart failure, sciatica, spinal stenosis, diabetes and lives on a personal oxygen tank.

They bought their house 14 years ago and had the intention to renovate the bathroom. Over the years they've given so much money and assistance to other family members that they never could get the bathroom done. Now, my grandma needs attention and assistance but the most we can do is sit outside the bathroom and listen to see if she falls or needs help.

This is because the bathroom is extremely small. It was added on to the house after indoor plumbing became a thing. The floor in the shower is concrete and is sinking into the ground under the house and the caulking around the edges is coming out as the floor sinks further and further. The concrete is also cracked and the floor of the shower is in 3 pieces and lets in cold air from outside. We have no way of installing shower handles. The sink and toilet and shower are shoved into a teeny space that even a skinny person has no room. You can't close the bathroom door if you are sitting on the toilet because your knees will block it from closing all the way.

I am doing this fundraiser to help raise money to get them a safe and disability friendly bathroom. I want to rip the old one to bits, lay a new foundation and build it out further taking space from the storage area outside behind d the current bathroom. Please help me do this for the two most wonderful people I've ever had the privilege of knowing.

We've reached the ""tipping point"" - leading edge approaches to mind-body wellness and more ...

More than a decade ago, Leigh Spusta set out to create the most effective and enjoyable therapeutic soundscapes available - international attention and preliminary brainwave analysis now shows that this goal is being realized. Leigh's PsimatiX™ recordings utilize a tried and true formula of brainwave entrainment technologies and  musical hypnotic modalities designed to bring the listener into ideal states of awareness and deep relaxation. In short, tuning the brain and the body towards wellness and maximizing human potential. Perhaps the most exciting venture we are exploring is the PsimatiX™ ""Sonic-Spa"" - allowing you to be fully immersed in rich, vibrational sound from head to toe... described in detail below.

Here is just a brief mention of what we are finding through preliminary studies of brainwave activity of listeners - both hemispheres moving into full synchronization and moving into alpha and theta states quickly, even delta states after 15 minutes! Relaxation response is very high and attention is maintained (not simply falling asleep). It has been observed that the PsimatiX™ audio also mimicks deep hypnotic behavior in subjects. So far, PsimatiX is out-performing other audio programs being tested.
Some of the noteworthy benefits of listening to brainwave audio :
Deep Relaxation
Reduction of stress, both physical and mental
Easy access to trance and meditative states
Emotional release
Sleep enhancement
Anxiety reduction
Ability to target specific brainwave states of Alpha, Theta, Delta, etc.
Trigger the release of endorphines, beta-endorphines, melatonin, seratonin, catecholamines, dopamine, HGH, DHEA
Reduction of heart rate and blood pressure
Increased cellular calcium and oxygen
Enhanced creativity
Improved memory, focus, concentration
Motivation
Current Titles in the PsimatiX Library :
Hypnotic Brainwave SoundScapes -
Distant Images
Mystic Ascension
Opus Magnum
Elemental Currents
Chakra Attunement Series
Deep Delta Program
Sonic Keys of Pythagoras
Warrior's Emanation
Hypnosis and Guided Imagery -
The DreamScape - Portal into Creative Dreaming
Merlin's Gift Imagery Program
Incredibly Good Luck Hypnosis
Past Life Regression Hypnosis
Opening the Third Eye - Psychic Intuition Program
Our campaign has 2 phases :
1. We have begun development on some new and exciting products, just a couple of which are :

The DreamTime Series - Using comprehensive brainwave audio, storytelling, and unique hypnosis strategies, these engaging programs will assist the listener to become more and more proficient at lucid dreaming. Lucid dreaming offers a whole new world of excitement, growth, and experience.

The Ultra Brainwave Bundle - This package will include many hours of rich, blissful soundscapes that target specific brainwave states / mind-sets such as High and Low Beta, Alpha, Theta, and Delta, and ""Hyper-Focus"", ""Healing Zone"", and ""Higher Consciousness"". Tap into your mind's power to best meet the needs of the day, sonic tools for empowerment.

To realize our first phase, we plan to invest in some new synthesizer equipment, audio software, and brainwave eeg analysis hardware (NeuroSky) and software. This will allow us a greater palette to compose cutting edge material, and also enable us to perform ongoing clinical studies of brainwave patterns and experiential reports of both existing and newer material.
2. Development of the new PsimatiX™ ""Sonic-Spa"" :

Sound-beds are a great way to experience a deeper level of PsimatiX™ audio, but they are often costly, bulky, or not quite good enough. The ""Sonic-Spa"" is a portable, lightweight, and affordable answer to people that would like to experience the full benefit of Leigh's PsimatiX™ audio programs. All of these programs contain vibro-acoustic tones which are felt by the body as a deeply soothing sonic massage. By lying comfortably on the Sonic-Spa, the listener will experience both the lush stereo sounds, and the blissful vibrational massage of the recording. As mentioned, studies are showing that PsimatiX™ audio, listened to with headphones or speakers, is out-performing other entrainment products. This is a full-immersion experience that is several times more powerful and effective than standard stereo or headphone listening alone. Imagine, your whole mind and body bathed in lush, therapeutic soundscapes, a musical massage. You can get a sense of what this is like by listening to one of our programs in the car (not while driving!) as the vibrations move through the seat - this is just a small taste of what the Sonic-Spa will be like. * (Provided we meet our goal, those who choose the Sonic-Spa perk will be contacted regarding the estimated delivery date.)

This design is meant to be simple and straight-forward, light-weight, easy to set up and break down, and easily transported. All three sections and the top cushion and pillow are covered in soft black velour. Set up will be quick - simply push the three sections together (velcro into place), connect the cables, unroll the top cushion, velcro the side speakers into place, place the pillow, and finally make sure the power supplies are plugged in and that your audio source is connected. (The Sonic-Spa can also connect to your 100 watt home theater stereo amplifier.) This will only take a few minutes and you're ready to sink into blissful comfort.

In addition to being the perfect complement to PsimatiX audio programs, the Sonic-Spa will also maximize the effectiveness of any relaxation / enhancement audio you choose to listen to, music, hypnosis, accelerated learning programs, etc. - imagine Maurice Ravel's ""Bolero"", or the sound of ocean waves, being infused into every cell of your body, an extremely immersive and enjoyable experience!

With your help we can move into the next chapter of PsimatiX™, offering our best audio programs and products yet to date. The science is here now, we are well past the binaural beat technology of the 1960's (most of the brainwave products out there are still using this!) and we want to bring these highly effective products to as many people as we can, and we plan to keep pushing the envelope, you can be a part of the mind-body technology revolution!
<div>
Here is the breakdown :

Whatever funding we raise will go to assure that we accomplish phase 1. If we do manage to reach or exceed our goal of $12,000 we will be in the prime position to reach phase 2 - Create the Sonic-Spa prototype, iron out the kinks, establish manufacturing connections, and scale down the retail cost. We anticipate the retail cost being in the neighborhood of $350, not bad for a portable high performance vibro-acoustic bed.

We will also set aside a portion of funds so that we can donate 1000 PsimatiX™ cds of selected relaxing, therapeutic music to cancer support and treatment centers in the Los Angeles area. We have been getting some great feedback about these audio tools in healing applications including cancer.

The rewards we are offering you are meant to inspire and motivate you to be involved in our journey, when you think of all the people who will benefit by these products, you'll know that you are helping to change the world!
<div>
More about PsimatiX™

It is our passion to bring the best possible products to people, we have gotten countless testimonies and feedback about how people's lives have been changed and enhanced by listening to our audio programs. Feel free to browse http://psimatix.com and get a feel for what we are about and what we've done so far. We have a newsletter you can sign up for and get a free PsimatiX™ audio program to download. You can also search for Leigh Spusta on youtube and on google play.
<div>
Other Ways You Can Help!
Aside from becoming a contributor, it would a very big help if you would spread the word about our campaign on facebook, twitter, friends, family and so on - we greatly appreciate it!

OmbyA was founded to support the goals of healing the earth, healing the people, and healing the planet through local and international action focused on identified needs.  To this end we seek and encourage the involvement of like-minded individuals in programs that contribute to the physical and spiritual well-being of all.
 
OmbyA identifies projects that contribute to existing needs within a given community and we then match people to resources to assist in meeting those needs.

Our work has included:
* The raising of funds and distribution of clothing to Stand Up for Kids in support of their work with homeless children in Los Angeles, California.
* Collection and distribution of blankets and food to the poor and needy in New Deli , India
* Special collections of money and human support for victims of the India earthquake.

Our newest project is to create a sanctuary location selected especially because of its beauty, its solitude, and the very energy of the location itself, where healers from all over the world can go to rest, recuperate and find healing for themselves.

Healers and those who walk the way of peace in our world often work in the most dire and poorest situations.  They give of their strength, their resources and their very souls to help and contribute to those around them. Yet who do they turn to when they are tired and exhausted and in need of healing and replenishement of body and spirit? Where can they go recharge their reserves so they have the resources to continue their work?

We believe that by creating an environment of beauty, peace and healing energies in which world-reknowned leaders of ways of peace can support and energize each other, we will be able to create a ripple effect that can benefit the planet exponentially.
<div>
Where We Are

So far we have done research on 60+ sites in our search for the right location, and the list has been narrowed to four possible sites in Costa Rica. We have done priliminary negotiations with owners of the finalist sites to verify their interest and all four owners are committed to participating in the project..
We are now seeking $40,000.00 to fund the next phase of the project which includes:
<div>
<ul>
• Costs of establishing a non-profit organization to manage the project
• Travel costs to return to Costa Rica with a select group of six people, including our architect, our land planner and two world-reknowned healers to choose the final site.
• Complete final negotiations with owner of the selected site
• Complete initial architectual and design documents for sanctuary buildings, obtain clearances and set construction schedule.

The world in which we live is a difficult and exhausting place.  Healers and those who walk the way of peace in our world are a precious and very special resource that must be cherished and supported so that they can continue to do the work that they do.

We believe that once the Sanctuary and the Healing Center are up and running it will be able to operate on a self-sustaining basis, providing benefit to healers and those in need alike.  Please join us in our mission.
We invite you to visit our website at www.ombya.com  And we ask you to  help turn this vision into a reality.

The goal was to produce a small air-powered MicroTurbine that could use the same technology I incorporated into our large industrial turbines over the last 6 years.  Using exactly the same blade shape and positioning as the large turbines, we have been able to create a small turbine that produces enough power to keep almost all personal devices charged. By just capturing ambient air flow, the turbine spins quietly.  As the turbine spins the tiny zero-cogging generator recharges the on-board battery.  When you need to recharge or operate a personal device, the turbine’s battery comes to life and provides the power.  With auto-sensing technology, the MicroTurbine knows exactly what voltage to provide.  Whether it is 1.2 volts or 15 volts, you’re covered. The advanced control circuits gently charge your device and quickly bring whatever you connect back to full strength.  Once the charging is complete, the air-powered turbine spins and reloads its on-board battery to be ready for the next task.  With full status indicators, you will always know the state of the MicroTurbine. The MicroTurbine is quiet, safe, and vibration-free just like all our big turbines.  It’s weather-proof so you can take it camping, sit it out in the snow, put it on the bow of your boat, or just set it on your desk.  It’s a small thing, but you are helping to eliminate some of the stress on the environment by not using a plug-in adapter. One more thing, the turbine is copper covered so it kills any air-borne bacteria, mold, and virus that come in contact with the turbine blades.  You make power and have a cleaner atmosphere.

We are raising money so that we can begin full production of the MicroTurbine.  It is fully tested and all the plans are complete.  We’ve identified and vetted multiple component manufacturers.  We have also set up the process for assembly here in the U.S.  Once we raise the necessary funding, we expect to have products flowing within 30 days.

The MicroTurbine is quiet, safe, and vibration-free just like all our big turbines.  It’s weather-proof so you can take it camping, sit it out in the snow, put it on the bow of your boat, or just set it on your desk.  It’s a small thing, but you are helping to eliminate some of the stress on the environment by not using a plug-in adapter. One more thing, the turbine is copper covered so it kills any air-borne bacteria, mold, and virus that come in contact with the turbine blades.  You make power and have a cleaner atmosphere.

We are raising money so that we can begin full production of the MicroTurbine.  It is fully tested and all the plans are complete.  We’ve identified and vetted multiple component manufacturers.  We have also set up the process for assembly here in the U.S.  Once we raise the necessary funding, we expect to have products flowing within 30 days.",0.0,0,"8 Campaigns

Let's clear the air! Indoor air is teeming with bacteria,
viruses, and mold spores, which can be hazardous to your health. Bugs
are nasty and getting nastier - some are antibiotic resistant, others
cause allergies, still others have traveled great distances from the
poultry factories of the Far East to get to your apartment. The world is
getting more crowded, more urbanized, and more traveled. Perfect

conditions for the spread of microbial mayhem.

What is the AERO ONE?

Designed by a physician (me), The AERO ONE is much more than an air purifier.
It is an air disinfector, designed to kill and remove living
microorganisms for the air as efficiently as possible. Unlike standard
physical air filtration systems, it uses a unique solid reactor system
which combines ultraviolet light with a solid matrix of UV-transmissible
lenses. This matrix creates turbulence in the airflow which slows down
microorganisms in the airstream, increasing the effective ultraviolet
exposure and maximizes their elimination. This system, termed 3D-UV,
has been independently tested by the prestigious Research Triangle
Institute has been proven to eliminate 100% of viruses, 99.97% of
bacteria and 99.91% of spores within a high-flow airstream.
In addition to the proprietary reactor system, the unit also includes a
pleated dust filter, filter, odor-controlling carbon filter, and a true
HEPA 99.97 postfilter. The prefilter is important for keeping dust
contamination The HEPA filter is critical in capturing the dead bodies
of microorganisms killed by the reactor. These particles, even though
dead and no longer directly  infectious, can still contribute to
allergies.
column3:
/>

The AERO ONE is 25in. tall, 15in. deep, and 12.5in. wide.

The

column1: 3D-UV technology was invented by our company founder, a physician who
was concerned about high air pathogen levels in hospitals.  Our first
product was developed for air disinfection in operating rooms and other
critical care areas. Our commercial-grade unit, the Tower One, has been
shown to greatly reduce culturable airborne bacterial levels in hospital
settings.  This unit is 200 pounds of stainless steel with heavy duty
components, medical grade materials, and very high air flow rates.
column3:
/>

AERO ONE’S big brother: An Aerobiotix T1 in a surgical supply room.

Ever

column1: since we first developed our commercial units, we have had requests for
a smaller, less expensive product for residential and light commercial
use. Air pathogen levels are a great concern in homes and offices as
well. That’s how the AERO ONE project was born. This was not an easy
task, but with a lot of engineering we were able to put the system on a
diet:  A more compact motor, smaller reactor and everything jammed into a
home-friendly cabinet.  We used less expensive materials, without
compromising the quality of the system. We changed the reactor material
from silicate quartz (far too fragile and expensive for a residential
unit)  to a type of plastic called fluorinated ethylene propylene (FEP)
which has nearly the same UV transmissibility as quartz, at a much lower
cost. We lowered the flow rate to levels more appropriate to
residential use and on par with currently available high-end residential
air purifiers. Importantly, it still remains assembled in the USA,

specifically Ohio and Kentucky.

The proprietary reactor system in
the AERO ONE is based upon an improvement in established ultraviolet
disinfection technology. C-band ultraviolet wavelengths (UVC) have been
shown to disrupt the DNA of microorganisms, leading to their
inactivation. The use of ultraviolet sources to inactivate
microorganisms goes back several decades, but there have been
significant limitations to the technology, particularly in the field of
air disinfection.  Unlike surface disinfection, air disinfection
requires you to hit a moving target. Since the rate of inactivation is
based upon the duration of UV exposure, faster air velocities
exponentially reduce the effectiveness of UV disinfection.. One way to
combat this effect is to increase the UV wattage, but this has side
effects including high power consumption, expense, and the formation of
dangerous ozone from oxygen molecules in the air.  In order to maintain
high kill rates with a modest UVC power a new system needed to be
developed.
column3:
/>

The problem: As air volume increases, the amount of UV power

column1: required for microorganism inactivation increases exponentially to

unsustainable levels.

We discovered that running the air
through a maze of randomly oriented lenses made from UVC-transmissible
material while simultaneously bombarding the airstream with UVC achieved
very high kill rates at modest power levels.  The maze, which we term
the reactor, facilitates microorganism inactivation in several ways:
• It creates turbulence in the airstream, reducing the net velocity of microorganisms.

• It transiently captures microorganisms in dead ends within the matrix, increasing exposure time

• It creates an increased surface area for inactivation to occur
column3:
/>

The 3D-UV reactor (commercial size) illuminated by UVC sources.

column1:
WHY BUY ONE?

Don’t let its subdued looks fool you,
the AERO ONE is a killer, from which virtually no microorganism emerges
alive. The dizzying array of “air purifiers” on the market all generally
have the same physical principle of operation:  Preventing big things
from going through slightly smaller holes.  They don’t know or care
whether that particle is living or dead. They offer a physical solution,
not a biological solution.
The AERO ONE offers a biological solution to a biological problem of

airborne pathogens.

Here are a few exceptional features of the AERO ONE:

• Compact footprint

• Low noise – 50 dB

• All steel construction, including stainless steel front

• Decision-free single speed*

• Quiet and vibration-free brushless AC motor

• Conforms to UL and CSA standards for safety

• Assembled in the USA of top quality materials

• HEPA postfilter 99.97% efficiency
•	Two stage prefilter, including odor-absorbing activated carbon layer
• Good for 200SFroom.

• Ball-bearing casters.

• Two 16W Philips ultraviolet sources

• No ozone generation

• Lamp integrity LED indicator

• 115 volt AC, 60 hertz, 5 ampere operation

*
The AERO ONE has only one fan speed. The 3D-UV reactor in this
application is designed to achieve maximal efficiency at a specific 200
CFM air flow rate. Lower speeds won’t generate enough turbulence in the
reactor to get the desired kill rate
exposure time needed to achieve the desired kill rate. Therefore there
is one and only one speed. Please don’t ask for multiple speeds, life is
full of sacrifices and sometimes compromises must be made in the

pursuit of excellence.

In fact, we regard with suspicion any air
purification system which has a wide array of speeds. The air flow rate
is critical to the efficiency of most filtration systems, particularly
HEPA systems. Low speeds are quiet, but perform negligible filtration
high speeds can easily overload small HEPA filters.

HOW IT WORKS:

The AERO ONE combines four modes of air treatment,
in a compact, portable recirculating unit. The four modes of air

treatment are:

1. Activated carbon prefiltration. An activated
carbon prefilter stage serves to remove odors in the airstream ,
including those commonly originating from pets, smoke,  cooking and
other sources. The carbon in embedded in a course foam which also serves

to capture large dust particles and gross contaminants.

2.
Medium efficiency pleated prefilter.  This 10 in x 10 in. prefilter has a
medium grade efficiency, similar to a furnace-type filter, only
smaller. This serves to capture small dust and dirt particles. This
prefilter element serves the important duty of preventing gross
particles from getting into the unit itself and contaminating the motor,

reactor and internal components.

3. The 3D-UV reactor. This unit
consists of a rectangular steel  box filled with several hundred
cylinders of UV-transmissible polymer.  The reactor is perforated on the bottom to
allow the air flow to pass though the cylinders. The cylinders are
illuminated by dual UV-lamps which are mounted to the top of the
reactor. The lamps are shielded by metal hoods, and the cylinders are
contained by a fine mesh to prevent them from blowing out of the reactor
box.  Any microorganisms or bioaerosols in the airstream are
decelerated, enturbulated, and temporarily captured within the matrix

while simultaneously being irradiated with UV-C light.

4. HEPA filter. This is a large 12 in. x 12 in. x 6in. true HEPA filter
which is rated at a 99.97% efficiency for 3 micron particles. This
filter is important in performing a final air polishing and prevent  any
inert biological material or proteins from being released back into the

air. 

The AERO ONE is in the late pre-production phase. We have completed
several functioning prototypes.  Currently we are in the process of
getting  our final UL and CSA safety certifications. Once those are
complete we will be getting our California Air Resources Board
certification for California sales.  All of our prints have been
completed, air flow and noise testing done, safety testing including
leakage current and high potential testing, all internal components have
been sourced. We are using the same regional contract manufacturer we
have used in the past so we expect the manufacturing process to go
smoothly.  We have designed our packaging and set up our packaging

supplier.

Since this prototype has been completed, we have
modified a few things, including changing the top/front panel from

aluminum to stainless steel, and improving the UV lamp shielding.


INITIAL COMMERCIALIZATION PLAN:

We are initially planning to sell the unit directly to consumers on Amazon.com.
We have set up a vendor account and will have them  handle the order
fulfillment.  For our first run, the unit will be certified for US and
Canada only.

COMMERCIALIZATION TIMELINE:

February 2014 Finalize UL and CSA certifications, Start initial production run.

March 2014 Complete initial production of first 50 units

Complete CARB certification

April 2014 Predelivery preparation and packaging

Shipment to fulfillment warehouse.

May 2014 First commercial delivery of product

Prepare for regular production of units

Contact us:

Summary

Worldwide, an estimated 15 million babies are born too soon every year. That is more than one in 10 babies. Around 1 million children die each year due to complications of preterm birth. Many survivors face a lifetime of disability, including learning disabilities and visual and hearing problems. 

Globally, prematurity is the leading cause of newborn deaths (babies in the first four weeks of life) and the second leading cause of death after pneumonia in children under the age of five.
column2: >Preterm birth occurs for a variety of reasons.
column3: >Common causes of preterm birth include multiple pregnancies, infections and chronic conditions, such as diabetes and high blood pressure
column4: however, often no cause is identified. There is also a genetic influence. Our scientists are trying to understand of the causes and mechanisms that will advance the development of treatments to prevent preterm birth.

column1: <h3>What We Need &amp
column2:
What You Get

We need funds to enable research to continue at The Women's Health Research Centre at Queen Charlotte's and Chelsea Hospital. All funds raised will go directly to the centre to support the Prematurity Research Theme. This includes researc
column3: >hing ways to predict the onset of Early Preterm labour, research into the role of vaginal microbiome in premature labour and research to understand the
column4: > risk of preterm labour due to cervical precancer and treatment.

column1: Please help fund this vital research.
For every donation of £20 and over you will receive a Family Portrait Voucher worth £160.00 for Barrett &
column2: Coe Photographic Studios. There are 28 outlets throughout the UK. <a href=""http://www.barrettandcoe.co.uk/portrait-photography/"" rel=""noopener nofollow"" target=""_blank"">Barrett &amp

column1: Our track record in this research area is exemplary. Our research unit at Imperial College has been responsible for such successes as developing the cervical cancer smear test, development of preimplantation genetic diagnosis (PGD) and early work on the development of ultrasound.

Recent success stories in prematurity research includes for example the work Professor Bennett and his team who discovered that a protein system which controls gene expressed called ‘Activator Protein One’ plays a very important role in the onset of both term and preterm labour. Previous work funded by Genesis Research Trust undertaken by Professor Edwards and Professor Henrik Hagberg had already shown that Activator Protein One also plays a role in perinatal brain injury. A full description of our successful research is available here. Our achievements.

Other Ways You Can Help

    You can always sign up for one of our challenges and raise funds via sponsorship for the Genesis Research Trust. Our patron explains why here.
